mapper.select: select a.LOGIN_SIZE,ROC_ID,a.USER_ID,a.STATUS,a.IC_ID,c.DEP_ID,e.BRANCH_ID from ESERVICE_JD.dbo.USERS a left join ESERVICE_ADM.dbo.USER_ENTITY b on a.USER_ID = b.USERNAME AND b.REALM_ID = 'elife_jdzq' left join ESERVICE_JD.dbo.USER_DEPARTMENT c on b.ID = c.USER_ID left join ESERVICE_ADM.dbo.USER_ROLE d on b.ID = d.USER_ID left join ESERVICE_JD.dbo.DEPARTMENT e on e.DEP_ID = c.DEP_ID where a.USER_ID = #{rocId} group by a.LOGIN_SIZE,ROC_ID,a.USER_ID,a.STATUS,a.IC_ID,c.DEP_ID,e.BRANCH_ID
mapper.insert: insert ESERVICE_JD.dbo.USER_IC (USER_ID, DEP_ID, BRANCH_ID) VALUES ( (SELECT A.ID FROM ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.USER_ENTITY A INNER JOIN ESERVICE_JD.DBO.USERS B ON A.USERNAME = B.USER_ID AND A.REALM_ID = 'elife_jdzq' WHERE B.IC_ID = #{jdUserVo.icId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), (SELECT TOP 1 DEP_ID FROM ESERVICE_JD.DBO.DEPARTMENT WHERE BRANCH_ID = #{jdUserVo.depId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{jdUserVo.branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select COUNT(1) from ESERVICE_JD.dbo.USER_IC where USER_ID = #{userId}
